title: Wild flowers of spring
brief_description: This film was produced in collaboration with the Botanical Gardens, Sydney and the Australian Museum, Sydney. Includes brief views of the Waratah, flannel flower, five corners, native heath, bottle brush, red and pink spider flowers, wax flower, Boronia rose, wedding bush.
